children.value: API now supports multiple, concurrent requests to update availability and rates on the same hotel.
Updated the maximum number of updates allowed in one message from 3000 to 5000.
Added sample message for bookings on Tax Inclusive properties.
Updated the documentation with details on bookings with Unicode characters.
Removed Simulator Documentation as this feature was deprecated.

node.rawBody:
#### December 1, 2020

API now supports multiple, concurrent requests to update availability and rates on the same hotel.

#### May 20, 2020

Updated the maximum number of updates allowed in one message from 3000 to 5000.

#### August 7, 2019

* Added sample message for bookings on Tax Inclusive properties.
* Updated the documentation with details on bookings with Unicode characters.

#### November 21, 2016

Removed Simulator Documentation as this feature was deprecated.

#### May 15, 2016

Initial version.

children.value: Added details on Changes to Expedia Collect (see blog from Sept. 7th, 2020 for more info).
Added section for error codes that only appear in partner reports.
Updated the Expedia Virtual Card sample messages to indicate CVV details being sent (seriesCode field).
Updated the Expedia Virtual Card address to the new Expedia Group headquarters address.
Unicode support launched. Applies to China, Hong Kong, Japan, Korea, and Taiwan. Requires your systems to support UTF-8 encoding.
Added sample messages for bookings with Unicode characters in the
Added sample message for email alias.
Updated Sample BR Responses with a No Credit Card booking example.
Added new supported credit card types: Union Pay and Carte Blanche.
Added new point of sale brands: American Express Travel, Amex The Hotel Collection, and Amex FINE HOTELS AND RESORTS.
Added new point of sale brands: Travelocity, Orbitz, Wotif, and other Expedia Group, Inc. brands.

node.rawBody:
#### October 7, 2020

Added 4202 error description.

#### September 3, 2020

Added details on Changes to Expedia Collect (see blog from Sept. 7th, 2020 for more info).

#### June 26, 2020

Added section for error codes that only appear in partner reports.

#### April 15, 2020

Updated the Expedia Virtual Card sample messages to indicate CVV details being sent (seriesCode field).

#### December 4, 2019

Updated the Expedia Virtual Card address to the new Expedia Group headquarters address.

#### August 7, 2019

- Unicode support launched. Applies to China, Hong Kong, Japan, Korea, and Taiwan. Requires your systems to support UTF-8 encoding.
- Added sample messages for bookings with Unicode characters in the <SpecialRequests> element and <PersonName>, <GivenName>, and <Surname> elements.

#### December 18, 2018

Added sample message for email alias.

#### December 10, 2018

Updated Sample BR Responses with a No Credit Card booking example.

#### June 29, 2018

- Added new supported credit card types: Union Pay and Carte Blanche.
- Added TLS 1.2 requirement.

#### October 31, 2017

Added HTTP header information.

#### April 11, 2017

Added new point of sale brands: American Express Travel, Amex The Hotel Collection, and Amex FINE HOTELS AND RESORTS.

#### March 31, 2017

Added new point of sale brands: Travelocity, Orbitz, Wotif, and other Expedia Group, Inc. brands.

#### May 15, 2016

Initial version.

children.value: Updated the categoryCodesEnum list with new Category Codes - for Exterior Patio and Spa category groups
Updated the categoryCodesEnum list with new Category Codes - for Exterior, Room and Property Amenity groups
Updated the categoryCodesEnum list with structure type-neutral codes

Now supporting updates to existing images’ metadata via PATCH verb. The PATCH modify operation is a way for you to send a request containing only the data you would like to modify about the image, as opposed to the entire data about the resource. From your perspective, the PATCH feature allows for modification of the image resource without having to pre-load the entire data about the resource.

Expedia Group implemented the Merge-PATCH strategy for Image API. You can send any of the top-level elements you'd like to modify, and omit the ones you do not want to change. Expedia Group will take care of merging the resource updates and preserve what was not included in your PATCH request.
Clarified categories and added examples to documentation

node.rawBody:
#### June 9, 2020

Updated the categoryCodesEnum list with new Category Codes - for Exterior Patio and Spa category groups

#### April 13, 2020

Updated the categoryCodesEnum list with new Category Codes - for Exterior, Room and Property Amenity groups

#### August 5, 2019

Updated the categoryCodesEnum list with structure type-neutral codes

#### September 23, 2016

Now supporting updates to existing images’ metadata via PATCH verb. The PATCH modify operation is a way for you to send a request containing only the data you would like to modify about the image, as opposed to the entire data about the resource. From your perspective, the PATCH feature allows for modification of the image resource without having to pre-load the entire data about the resource.

Expedia Group implemented the Merge-PATCH strategy for Image API. You can send any of the top-level elements you'd like to modify, and omit the ones you do not want to change. Expedia Group will take care of merging the resource updates and preserve what was not included in your PATCH request.

For complete information, refer to [PATCH feature](/property_mgmt_apis/image/getting_started/integration-overview-landing-page#using-patch-to-update-images).

#### September 10, 2016

Renamed guide by resourceID

#### August 24, 2016

Clarified categories and added examples to documentation

#### August 19, 2016

Image API v1 officially live

children.value: Added details on Changes to Expedia Collect (see blog from Sept. 7th, 2020 for more info).
Added description for booking confirmation warning code 10105. Updated hotel collect example to reflect guest address is NOT actually sent.
Updated the Cardholder address for Expedia Virtual Cards to the new Expedia Group headquarters address in all applicable sample messages.
Unicode support launched. Applies to China, Hong Kong, Japan, Korea, and Taiwan. Requires partner systems to support UTF-8 encoding. For additional details see
Added sample message for email alias.
Updated Sample BR Responses with a No Credit Card booking example.
Added new supported credit card types: Union Pay and Carte Blanche.

node.rawBody:
#### September 7, 2020

Added details on Changes to Expedia Collect (see blog from Sept. 7th, 2020 for more info).

#### June 26, 2020

Added description for booking confirmation warning code 10105. Updated hotel collect example to reflect guest address is NOT actually sent.

#### December 3, 2019

Updated the Cardholder address for Expedia Virtual Cards to the new Expedia Group headquarters address in all applicable sample messages.

#### July 30, 2019

Unicode support launched. Applies to China, Hong Kong, Japan, Korea, and Taiwan. Requires partner systems to support UTF-8 encoding. For additional details see [Unicode Support](/booking_apis/booking_retrieval/getting_started/what-s-new-#unicode-support).

#### December 18, 2018

Added sample message for email alias.

#### December 10, 2018

Updated Sample BR Responses with a No Credit Card booking example.

#### June 29, 2018

- Added new supported credit card types: Union Pay and Carte Blanche.
- Added TLS 1.2 requirement.

children.value: Updated support of custom cancellation policy.
Updated Eligibility for Hotel Loyalty Points value addition to Eligible for Hotel Loyalty Points.

Added Wholesale Rate Plan to the list of Rate Plan types. Wholesale Rate Plan to be supported only during the GET and not during PUT,POST,PATCH or DELETE. The error code list is updated with 3232 error code which is returned when Create, Update or Delete of Wholesale Rate Plan is attempted.
Updated the Contact us link to direct additional questions.
Updated additionalGuestAmount resource to include missing percent.
Added fitness codes for Room Amenity:
These do not require detail codes: ROOM_TREADMILL, ROOM_STATIONARY_BIKE, ROOM_ROWING_MACHINE, ROOM_ELLIPTICAL_MACHINE
Use IN_ROOM or ON_REQUEST detail codes : ROOM_FREE_WEIGHTS, ROOM_STREAMING_FITNESS_CLASSES, ROOM_WORKOUT_APPAREL, ROOM_OTHER_WORKOUT_EQUIPMENT

Updates made to the ROOM_COFFEE_TEA and ROOM_ELECTRONIC_DEVICE amenity codes to not support detailed codes anymore. Alternatively, each detail code has now been spun up as a different Amenity Code. Here are the new amenity codes: ROOM_COFFEE_AND_TEA_MAKER, ROOM_ESPRESSO_MAKER, ROOM_ELECTRIC_KETTLE, ROOM_COMPUTER, ROOM_TABLET, ROOM_IPAD.
Updated Expedia's requirements to certify Product API. Refer to the JSON Reference topic for more information.
Support for the No Room Size Amenity.

Support for 100+ new amenities spread across all categories: Internet access, Bathroom, Food-related, In-room entertainment, Bedding and linens, Room layout, In-room service, Room features, and Club/executive level. Added a new category for accessibility amenities inside guest accommodations.
Support for Regulatory Exemption Categories under
Updates made to Room type resource management to the V3 version, which includes bedroom and living room details. V2 versions moved over to the Archived section.
for Property level GET. Added documentation references in Sample Messages and Reference.
Added support documentation about Per Stay Service Fees at the Rate plan level (GET, POST, PUT).
Added information about managing deposit required flag in conjunction with Deposit API.
link in Rate Plan's links section of the response payload on GET Rate Plan and GET Rate Plans operations.
Added access to room type and rate plan resources without "/products" in endpoint path.
Corrected list of support room views.

Released new feature to expose a rate plan's deposit required flag, create, and last update dates in read-only format. These attributes can be read via GET. They cannot be provided with a create request (deposit is set to false by default), and they cannot be changed in update requests.
Released a new feature to expose a room type's rate thresholds, in read-only format. Only GET operation is allowed on this sub resource.

Released a new feature to expose RatePlanLinkage information in read-only format in rate plan GET. Added a links section to the show rate plan resource's link to itself, its rate plan linkage parent, if any, and/or its derived child rate plans, if any.
New section documenting changes between V1 and V2 was added to the documentation.

Product API v2 is now live. Versioning strategy changed from URL to using content-type and accept headers. As a result, URLs have all changed to have V1 removed when you are ready to use V2. Room type resource changed significantly for defining bed types and occupancy.
Added support for cancel policy exceptions.
Added support for Rate Plan Delete.
Refreshed list of supported value adds, added more pricing models supported, clarified required VS optional fields.
Added support for room-level amenities (GET and PUT).
Support for read/create/update room views and wheelchair accessibility in room type resource.
First version of the online API. Additional feature since last PDF version: support for read/create/update room size in room type resource.

node.rawBody:
#### February 8, 2021

* Updated support of custom cancellation policy.

#### December 10, 2020

* Updated Eligibility for Hotel Loyalty Points value addition to Eligible for Hotel Loyalty Points.

#### November 9, 2020

* Added Wholesale Rate Plan to the list of Rate Plan types. Wholesale Rate Plan to be supported only during the GET and not during PUT,POST,PATCH or DELETE. The error code list is updated with 3232 error code which is returned when Create, Update or Delete of Wholesale Rate Plan is attempted.
* Updated the Contact us link to direct additional questions.
* Updated additionalGuestAmount resource to include missing percent.

#### October 30, 2020

Added fitness codes for Room Amenity: 
- These do not require detail codes: ROOM_TREADMILL, ROOM_STATIONARY_BIKE, ROOM_ROWING_MACHINE, ROOM_ELLIPTICAL_MACHINE
- Use IN_ROOM or ON_REQUEST detail codes : ROOM_FREE_WEIGHTS, ROOM_STREAMING_FITNESS_CLASSES, ROOM_WORKOUT_APPAREL, ROOM_OTHER_WORKOUT_EQUIPMENT

####  July 7, 2020

Updated ROOM_NO_HAIRDRYER to ROOM_NO_HAIR_DRYER.

#### May 22, 2020

* Updates made to the ROOM_COFFEE_TEA and ROOM_ELECTRONIC_DEVICE amenity codes to not support detailed codes anymore. Alternatively, each detail code has now been spun up as a different Amenity Code. Here are the new amenity codes: ROOM_COFFEE_AND_TEA_MAKER, ROOM_ESPRESSO_MAKER, ROOM_ELECTRIC_KETTLE, ROOM_COMPUTER, ROOM_TABLET, ROOM_IPAD.
* Updated Expedia's requirements to certify Product API. Refer to the JSON Reference topic for more information.

#### April 29, 2020

Support for the No Room Size Amenity.

#### April 2, 2020

Support for 100+ new amenities spread across all categories: Internet access, Bathroom, Food-related, In-room entertainment, Bedding and linens, Room layout, In-room service, Room features, and Club/executive level. Added a new category for accessibility amenities inside guest accommodations.

#### February 14, 2020

Support for Regulatory Exemption Categories under `regulatoryRecords` for Room type actions.

#### December 12, 2019

Updates made to Room type resource management to the V3 version, which includes bedroom and living room details. V2 versions moved over to the Archived section.

#### June 7, 2019

Released new feature to expose <allowedAgeCategories> for Property level GET. Added documentation references in Sample Messages and Reference.

#### June 15, 2018

Added support documentation about Per Stay Service Fees at the Rate plan level (GET, POST, PUT).

#### August 7, 2017

-   Added information about managing deposit required flag in conjunction with Deposit API.
-   Added documentation about new <depositPolicy> link in Rate Plan's links section of the response payload on GET Rate Plan and GET Rate Plans operations.

#### July 31,2017

Added access to room type and rate plan resources without "/products" in endpoint path.

#### May 19, 2017

Corrected list of support room views.

#### November 12, 2016

Released new feature to expose a rate plan's deposit required flag, create, and last update dates in read-only format. These attributes can be read via GET. They cannot be provided with a create request (deposit is set to false by default), and they cannot be changed in update requests.

#### October 20, 2016

Released a new feature to expose a room type's rate thresholds, in read-only format. Only GET operation is allowed on this sub resource.

#### October 18, 2016

Released a new feature to expose RatePlanLinkage information in read-only format in rate plan GET. Added a links section to the show rate plan resource's link to itself, its rate plan linkage parent, if any, and/or its derived child rate plans, if any.

#### September 29, 2016

New section documenting changes between V1 and V2 was added to the documentation.

#### June 10, 2016

Product API v2 is now live. Versioning strategy changed from URL to using content-type and accept headers. As a result, URLs have all changed to have V1 removed when you are ready to use V2. Room type resource changed significantly for defining bed types and occupancy.

#### May 2, 2016

Added support for cancel policy exceptions.

#### April 27, 2016

Added support for Rate Plan Delete.

#### April 4, 2016

Refreshed list of supported value adds, added more pricing models supported, clarified required VS optional fields.

#### February 1, 2016

Added support for room-level amenities (GET and PUT).

#### January 7, 2016

Support for read/create/update room views and wheelchair accessibility in room type resource.

#### December 7, 2015

First version of the online API. Additional feature since last PDF version: support for read/create/update room size in room type resource.

#### August 11, 2017

Deposit API v1 officially launched

node.rawBody:
#### November 19, 2020

- Added SKI_STORAGE amenity code to Skiing and snow activities section of [Enumerations](/property_mgmt_apis/property/reference/enumerations).

#### October 7, 2020

- Removed fax as notification channel. LCAM team reached out to partners regarding this change. This just needed partner documentation update.
- Moved Breakfast DetailCodes, which need start and end time added to Policies section.

#### August 14, 2020

Changed POOL_CHILDRENS to CHILDRENS_POOL.

#### July 8, 2020

Deprecated NO_DATE_RANGE detailCode for CLOSURE_ONE and RENOVATION_ONE codes. Added PERCENTAGE_PER_STAY duration to be used with PERCENTAGE_PER_ACCOMMODATION scope for CLEANING_FEE code.

#### June 16, 2020

Added additional detail codes for FORMS_OF_PAYMENT_ACCEPTED code under Policy Section.

#### June 15, 2020

Added additional Fee codes under Mandatory Fees section.

#### June 10, 2020

Moved Fee codes with no values under Fee Inclusive / Excluded section. Made Fee Inclusive / Excluded a sub-section under Policies.

#### June 2, 2020

Added Enhanced Cleaning and Traveler Safety codes under Policy Section.

#### May 22, 2020

Added more detail to error messages returned during property status GET request on the Code Lists page.

#### April 29, 2020

Removed view\_\* amenity codes from Property API, as they are used in Product API. Added text to clarify values for SPA_TUB with detail code MULTIPLE.

#### April 24, 2020

Made changes to ROOM_COFFEE_TEA_MAKER, ROOM_ESPRESSO_MAKER, ROOM_ELECTRIC_KETTLE, and THEME_SHOPPING_PROPERTY in the [Appliances and other room features](/property_mgmt_apis/property/reference/enumerations#appliances-and-other-room-features) and [Property theme](/property_mgmt_apis/property/reference/enumerations#property-theme) sections.

#### April 7, 2020

Updated CUISINE_INDONESIAN typo in RESTAURANT_TWO, THREE, FOUR and FIVE in the [Restaurant specifics](/property_mgmt_apis/property/reference/enumerations#restaurant-specifics) section.

#### April 1, 2020

Removed SURCHARGE_AMT from Optional Fees section in [Enumerations](/property_mgmt_apis/property/reference/enumerations).

#### March 31, 2020

Made changes to DEPOSIT and PERCENTAGE\_ DURATION in Mandatory Fees section of [Enumerations](/property_mgmt_apis/property/reference/enumerations).

#### March 26, 2020

Updated the Mandatory Fees section to remove Amount or Surcharge_Amount. Updated DATE attributes to retrieve the correct format of START_DATE and END_DATE. Updated new Image Subcategories for Accessibility, Room Facilities and Property Exterior sections in [Enumerations](/property_mgmt_apis/property/reference/enumerations).

#### January 30, 2020

Removed Registrations section. isVacationRental is now the only field sent within Property API while the majority of regulatory information will be captured at the unit level within Product API under the regulatoryRecords section.

#### December 12, 2019

Added support of new "cash only" form of payment in [Payment information](/property_mgmt_apis/property/reference/enumerations#payment-information) section of [Enumerations](/property_mgmt_apis/property/reference/enumerations).

#### December 2, 2019

Additional self check-in instructions amenities added under the [Check-in, check-out, and front desk policies](/property_mgmt_apis/property/reference/enumerations/#check-in-check-out-and-front-desk-policies) section in [Enumerations](/property_mgmt_apis/property/reference/enumerations).

#### October 30, 2019

Added additional activities including Adventure Activities, Safari, Sports Activities, Water Based Activities, and Skiing and Snowboarding.

#### August 16, 2019

Added support of isVacationRental boolean within the API.

#### July 3, 2019

Added support of Hide Address and Hide Exact location capabilities.

#### June 21, 2019

Added additional content in [Enumerations](/property_mgmt_apis/property/reference/enumerations) including: additional amenities, activities, property themes, and negative amenities.

#### November 19, 2018

Added support of Breakage Deposits in the [Enumerations](/property_mgmt_apis/property/reference/enumerations).

#### August 20, 2018

Updated the [Enumerations](/property_mgmt_apis/property/reference/enumerations) page to have all the Amenity, Attribute, Policy, Image Category codes called out.

#### May 18, 2018

Added Languages Spoken to the [Enumerations](/property_mgmt_apis/property/reference/enumerations) for Amenities.

#### May 15, 2018

Added ContractTermsChanging and CurrencyCodeChanging to PendingReview Reason Codes.

#### April 25, 2018

Added support for Number of Bedrooms, Number of Bathrooms, Occupancy under [Enumerations](/property_mgmt_apis/property/reference/enumerations) - Policies.

#### April 20, 2018

Added support for the Read/Update by ExpediaID use case.

#### November 10, 2017

Added support Decentralized Billing and sample onboarding request to the documentation.
